title: 8-Bit Fantasy & Adventure Music
description: 8-Bit Fantasy & Adventure - is PERFECT for RPG adventures, battles, platforming and more.
longDescription:
This music pack contains 13 tracks, 11 loopable tracks and 2 «game over» and «win» tracks. Additionally, I added drumless versions of all the tracks (8 more), giving a total of 22 tracks of adventure music in authentic 8-bit style. These songs are a mix of energy, whimsy, atmosphere and fun, making them perfect for RPG adventures, battles, platforming and more.


Tracklist:

  • Main Theme – Legendary Hero [02:04]
  • The adventure begins! [Loop] [00:47]
  • Symphony of Shadows [Loop] [00:56]
  • Serene Melancholy [Loop] [00:40]
  • Joyful Adventure [Loop] [00:24]
  • Hero’s path [Loop] [00:37]
  • Dance of Mystery [Loop] [00:28]
  • Crest of Destiny [Loop] [00:26]
  • City of Darkness [Loop] [00:48]
  • Knight’s Duel [Loop] [00:51]
  • Final Boss [Loop] [00:54]
  • Game Over Theme [00:11]
  • Win Theme [00:04]


Alternative Version:

  • Main Theme – Legendary Hero [Loop] [01:55]
  • Main Theme – Legendary Hero [Loop No Drums] [01:55]
  • The adventure begins! [Loop No Drums] [00:47]
  • Joyful Adventure [Loop No Drums] [00:24]
  • Hero’s path [Loop No Drums] [00:37]
  • Crest of Destiny [Loop No Drums] [00:26]
  • City of Darkness [Loop No Drums] [00:48]
  • Knight’s Duel [Loop No Drums] [00:51]
  • Final Boss [Loop No Drums] [00:54]


I hope these hints help you in your games! You don’t need to credit me, but I’d love to know when and how you use this music so I can share your gameplay with my audience.


Best,

Tito Lopez.



https://youtu.be/c2-IjcIqUlI


https://soundcloud.com/titolopez-music/sets/chiptune-music-album-8-bit-fantasy-adventure
